title: Looking for other bronze players.
body:
Bronze player. Looking to join a team. I prefer top, adc, mid.
I play around 5:00 am to 9:00 am Eastern time. 
IGN: MankeyLv12

I am more passive go for late game. I am probably not the best in team fights. I have always solo queue but I am tired of auto fill and getting so many bad players so I thought I might try joining a team.

replies.body: hey mankley you should check us out https://ethereal-gaming.com/ find people to play with in our gaming community.
